txt.en: Talk to Carandolion on the lowest level of Ost Arndír
'My husband was looking for you. Return to the lowest level and find him.'
Nauriel's sword and shield have been made ready for the voyage, and can be found on the lowest level of Ost Arndír.
'Might I speak with you for a moment?'
Bring her sword and shield to Nauriel in Ost Arndír

'Thank you for bringing me my equipment, [placeholder], and for speaking with my husband. I will carry his favour into battle on behalf of our son Thorongil, should battle prove necessary. My husband would be the first to tell you he is no fighter, but I love him all the more for it. I do our fighting for us, and without regret.

'Carandolion will see that Pinnath Gelin does not suffer in my absence, and when I return I will return with our son, and only his father will celebrate more loudly and happily than I.

'I will await your command, and the rest of your crew, at the Wave-hunter.'
Nauriel's husband Carandolion is on the lowest level of Ost Arndír.
Retrieve Nauriel's sword from the armoury in Ost Arndír
Nauriel is in the main hall, on the upper level of Ost Arndír.
